attributes.action: Set aside monies for new boys/girls Grammar Shools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: OUR BOYS/GIRLS GRAMMAR SCHOOLS IN KENT ARE TOO SMALL FOR THE AMOUNT OF STUDENTS PASSING THEIR 11+ WE HAD HUNDREDS THIS YEAR BEING TOLD 'WELL DONE YOU PASSED YOUR 11+ BUT THERE IS NO PLACE FOR YOU' THIS IS TOTALLY UNACCEPTABLE & HEARTBREAKING FOR STUDENTS WHO WORK SO HARD TO ACHEIVE THIS LEVEL TO BE TURNED DOWN SO CRUELLY. THIS GOVERMENT ONLY THINKS OF IT'S OWN WELLBEING & NOT THE GOOD BRITISH PEOPLE WHO LIVE & LOVE THIS COUNTRY.WE SHOULD BE ENCOURAGING OUR YOUNGSTERS WHO WANT TO MAKE SOMETHING OF THEMSELVES BECAUSE THERE ARE STILL SOME DECENT YOUNG PEOPLE OUT THERE WHO WANT TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE & MAKE THIS A BETTER WORLD TO LIVE IN, THEY ARE OUR FUTURE.
